altername_name: Dagobar: Captain Gather Znowu W Akcji
name: Dagobar
overview: Dagobar is a timed puzzle game. Captain Gather returns to save the space disaster. The abandoned base in the Dagobar star system is full of thermonuclear TN3 materials and threatens uncontrolled explosion on a cosmic scale. The player must destroy the materials by combining them in the right order causing an explosive reaction. The player controls a spaceship with missiles. The materials can be pushed down or up and they are moving in the desired direction until encounter a blocking obstacle. The rockets are used to create the materials storage area.
